comments:
Description:
Exception occurs when preview a report include a highlight rule on column dimension, I have tested on row dimension, it works well and only the column dimension's highlight rule has exception and the result is incorrect.'

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070522-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a crosstab or open the attached report design
2, Specify the highlight on column dimension
3, Preview

Expected result:
The highlight rule can take effect without exceptions when preview

Actual result:
Exception occurs and the highlight is not correct in preview

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- There are errors evaluating script "data["PRODUCT_TYPE"]":{1}. 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
